title: Customer Churn Prediction
description: Built a machine learning model to predict customer churn using advanced ensemble methods and feature engineering techniques. Achieved 92% accuracy with actionable insights for retention strategies.

title: Sales Forecasting Dashboard
description: Developed an interactive dashboard for sales forecasting using time series analysis and ARIMA models. Integrated real-time data visualization and automated reporting features.

title: Sentiment Analysis API
description: Created a RESTful API for sentiment analysis of social media posts using NLP techniques and deep learning models. Deployed on AWS with scalable architecture.

title: Market Basket Analysis
description: Performed comprehensive market basket analysis using association rule mining to identify product relationships and optimize cross-selling strategies for e-commerce platform.

title: Healthcare Data Pipeline
description: Designed and implemented an ETL pipeline for healthcare data processing, ensuring HIPAA compliance and enabling real-time analytics for patient monitoring systems.

title: Fraud Detection System
description: Built an anomaly detection system for financial transactions using unsupervised learning algorithms and real-time processing to identify fraudulent activities.
